document.full_text: the bank of greece, the country's central bank, plans to ask banks to boost their capital adequacy ratio to ease market fears over the impact of a haircut on greek government bonds they hold, a greek newspaper said on sunday.
document.title: greece to ask banks to boost capital ratios: report
lines_and_colors: the bank of greece, the country's central bank, plans to ask banks to boost their capital adequacy ratio to ease market fears over the impact of a haircut on greek government bonds they hold, a greek newspaper said on sunday.
